entries: You grew up among the southern houses of Brevoy in old Rostland. You're accustomed to arguing from a position of underappreciated worth.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Diplomacy} skill and the {@skill Lore||Politics Lore} skill.
You gain the {@feat Group Impression} skill feat.
